body.name: Rechargeable Desk Lamp, Foldable Portable Battery Operated Desk Lamp for Home Office, 2500mAh Cordless LED Desk Lamp with Flashlight Function, Eye Protection Study Lamp (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 10 mins
features: 【High-capacity battery desk lamp】Our wireless desk lamp features a massive 2500mAh battery capacity. With a single charge, the brightest white light desk lamp mode can provide illumination for approximately 16 hours, and the lowest light setting can last for about ten days.

【Three Color Temperatures, Adjustable Brightness Touch Desk Lamp】This portable desk lamp offers three adjustable modes of white light, warm light, and warm white light. The brightness of the lamp can be adjusted as well. The lamp comes with a one-year warranty.

【Eye-Care Desk Lamp】 Our LED desk lamp is flicker-free, helping to reduce eye fatigue and care for your eyes. With a large illuminated area, the light is evenly and softly distributed. This cordless LED table lamp is an excellent choice for anyone in need of a stylish and practical lighting fixture. It can be a perfect gift for yourself or your loved ones.

【One Lamp, Dual Purpose Design】This small desk lamp can be used as a flashlight when folded. It is perfect for use as a small desk lamp, a desk lamp for a home office, a portable reading light, a table nail lamp, or a study light. It is a great cordless lamp that can be used in various places, such as your backyard or during camping trips. Additionally, it can be used as an emergency light during power outages. With its sleek and minimalist design, it doesn't take up much space.
【rechargeable desk lamp】Our battery operated desk lamp is designed to provide cordless convenience and flexibility. Say goodbye to the hassle of finding a power outlet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable, Lightweight, Versatile Desk Lamp! Perfect for On-the-Go!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very nice & chic desk lamp! Love how it has 3 different light settings with Dimmable features through a touch of a button. The brightness of the Desk Lamp is overall okay. It is not super bright like other desk lamps but sufficient enough for a small workspace. Overall I tend to use this as a secondary/backup light source in places that doesn’t have sufficient lighting.It is also versatile as it is shaped & about the size of an average flashlight as it act as one! As others have mentioned, it does require the desk lamp to be closed & a double tap to turn on the flashlight feature. Which I do appreciate because when on-the-go, the double tap feature can prevent the flashlight from turning on accidentally & eventually draining the battery, which I have experienced from other similar products. Of note, the Flashlight feature only has 1 light setting. Overall it is not super bright, but I think it has enough brightness to illuminate your way through a power outage!There is also a red light indicator to indicate when it is charging. Although, not quite sure how long it would last after a full charge or if it would live up to the “16 hours of illumination & 10 days if on the lowest setting” as advertised. Only time will tell!Also, the one I had purchased is the Black colored one, and one of the things I have noticed is that it is a fingerprint magnet.. So buyers beware, if you are purchasing the Black colored one, make sure your hands are clean or else over time you can see finger prints on it!Overall, really great & beautiful product! Would definitely recommend this product to those who are looking for a lightweight, non-bulky portable desk lamp and a flashlight as a side piece!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is amazing. It will hold a charge for over two days, used for 8 hours a day. It's lightweight and I love the flashlight feature. The base is small which helps putting in a tight area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel.
reviews.reviewText: It looks futuristic, it takes up little space and is bright enough to do work or study , then lower to read then even lower to chill. Height recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best power outage light ever
reviews.reviewText: The fold-up desk light function is SO useful during blackouts. It covers a broad area and adjusts to point directly to your working area. You can set it down to illuminate your whole working area, and continue doing whatever you were doing before the power went out. No more trying to prop up a standard flashlight on a pillow or having to hold a book sideways next to a lantern. The fact that you can adjust brightness means that if power company tells you it’s going to be a day or so before power comes back down, you can dim the light and keep it working on and off throughout. Or, if power is expected to be restored in a few hours, turn it on bright. I keep mine plugged in and fully charged so it’s available the moment power goes out. I loved mine so much I bought four more as gifts and all the recipients also were remarking how useful it was during last blackout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars company made it right
reviews.reviewText: The company saw this review and made it right. They contacted me right away and sent my daughter a new light. I am very impressed!original problem: Worked for less than 3 weeks. from my daughter at college: the desk lamp isn't working because when I turn it on it usually stays on for about a minute and then flickers off and if I try to turn it on again, it turns off even faster than the first time and after that it only stays on while I'm holding the button

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not bright enough
reviews.reviewText: I tried to return this product because it is not bright at all. It makes no difference. It probably would be better to use with a smaller ipad. The flashlight option is cool but I needed a light by my laptop not a flashlight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great concept when it worked
reviews.reviewText: Loved the concept and how portable/compact it was. I used it for only a week or two and then the light just turns off when in lamp mode. Will not stay on more than 1 minute before turning off. Still works as a flashlight hence my 3 star versus 1 star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RECOMMEND!!! Best minimalist desk lamp I’ve had.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been searching for a minimalist desk lamp for my study table in my room since we had a power outage from the hurricane last year. But out of all the ones that I’ve tried, this lamp is just perfect. Good lighting with 3 different modes, fairly light, and it also functions as a flashlight! Making it both being a desk lamp and a flashlight is pure genius. The one function that I was most worried about is the touch sensitivity of the power button because my last desk lamp had a touch sensitivity defect. However, this lamp’s power switch is sensitive to the touch, making it easier to turn on/off.
